document.full_text: adidas said soaring demand from the united states, china and russia for its sneakers would offset a profit hit from the japan earthquake, allowing it to raise its sales outlook for the second time this year.
document.title: "on fire" adidas steps up sales goal
lines_and_colors: adidas said soaring demand from the united states, china and russia for its sneakers would offset a profit hit from the japan earthquake, allowing it to raise its sales outlook for the second time this year.
